title: Tweetpresso
subtitle: Twitter clone with an espresso twist
fullDescription: Dive into the world of social networking with Tweetpresso, a full-fledged Twitter clone that harnesses the power of Firebase to create a seamless and engaging user experience. Over the course of two months, I meticulously developed Tweetpresso, a dynamic web application that not only replicates the core functionalities of Twitter but also integrates modern features and scalability.

title: SAP assist
subtitle: AI support bot
fullDescription: SAP assist is an AI support bot that helps users fill out support tickets. Using the OPENAI API, we developed the chatbot to work using a task system. Each time the bot completes a task it calls a function which moves it onto the next task. The prupose of the bot is to get a much information as possible for the SAP engineer. This project won the 2023 Galway Ideaslab eneterprise challenge. SAP chose our solution as the most suitable and easiest to intergrate.
